Name: PT. KARYA INTERCHEM MITRANIAGA
Description:
PT. KARYA INTERCHEM MITRANIAGA adalah produsen produk-produk Chemicals untuk maintenance, cleaning, water treatment dan distributor barang-barang kimia kebutuhan industri, oil & gas, dan sebagainya Atl : - Degreaser, pembersih minyak ( Alkalin , Solvent , Emulsion ) - Carbon Remover - Scale Remover - oil spill dispersant ( OSD ) - Paint Remover - Rust Remover - Aluminium Cleaner - Stainless cleaner - passivasi - Electrik Motor Cleaner - AC Cleaner - Penetrating Oil - Rust Preventive Oil - Corrosion Inhibitor - CWT Anti Lumut - CWT Anti Kerak - Boiler water treatment - Resin Exchange ( cation / anion ) Lewatit , Dowex - Silicone Oil, Silicone Emulsion - acid Corrotion inhibitor armohib 18 / 28, DLL - Kami juga menerima jasa cleaning Atl : Boiler, Chiller, Condensor, H.E, Cooling Tower, AHU, FCU, Passivasi pipa, Tanky Dll.
